job description:
Big Data Engineer
Based in the San Jose, CA area, we are one of the most innovative, global analytics solutions companies in the World. We are an well-funded, offering exposure to fortune level clients, and the chance to change the way people interact with the world on a daily basis. Our team is composed of experts in the world of Big Data with a leadership team that brings experiences from leading global technology firms and pride themselves in their hands-on, mentor level management style.

We are committed to continually leveraging and optimizing Deep Learning AI technologies that challenge the status quo and evolve data solutions that generate clinical insights in days versus months, reducing drug development timelines by up to 26 weeks and expediting the delivery of your breakthrough therapies to the patients who need them.

If you are a strong Big Data Architect with Java and Hadoop expertise, we would welcome the opportunity to discuss the details.

What You Need for this Position
Currently hands on development of in Big Data Hadoop ecosystem & Analytics space
Minimum of 10+ years of hands-on experience including architecture, design of enterprise applications in Java, Spring, Hibernate, Restful Web Services, HTML5, AngularJS, Python, AWS/Google compute/Azure.
Experience of implementing solutions on Big data technologies like - Hadoop, SPARK, Pig, Hive, Spark, Storm, Impala, Oozie, Mahout, Flume, ZooKeeper and/or Sqoop
3+ years of experience as a technology leader designing and developing data architecture solutions with more than 2+ years specializing in big data architecture or data analytics.
Come up with solutions based on open source Big Data Analytics framework.
Closely follow the changes in the open source community specifically regarding Big Data, Data Science and Analytics

What's In It for You
We are willing to offer excellent compensation packages including annualized pay potential of $120k - $200k, plus EQUITY, and excellent benefits.

So, if you are looking for a growth opportunity, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
